rt_booking_process_text: To book the caravan, please contact us via the contact form on our website or by phone. We will confirm availability and provide you with a booking confirmation. A booking is considered firm once the deposit is paid.
rt_payment_terms_text: We accept bank transfers and cash payments. Full payment is due 14 days before the rental period begins. For bookings made less than 14 days in advance, full payment is due at the time of booking.
rt_deposit_req_text: A security deposit of €200 is required. This deposit will be refunded within 7 days after the return of the caravan, provided it is returned in good condition and all terms have been met.
rt_cancellation_text: Cancellations made more than 30 days before the rental start date will receive a full refund of the deposit. Cancellations made 15-30 days before will forfeit 50% of the deposit. Cancellations made less than 15 days before will forfeit the entire deposit. No refund is provided for the rental fee if cancelled less than 14 days before the rental period or in case of a no-show.
rt_pickup_location_text: The caravan is to be picked up and returned to our location in Tartu, South Estonia. The exact address will be provided upon booking confirmation.
rt_pickup_times_text: Pickup time is typically from 14:00 on the first day of rental. Return time is by 12:00 on the last day of rental. Alternative times may be arranged subject to availability and prior agreement.
rt_condition_check_text: A joint inspection of the caravan will be conducted at pickup and return. Any existing damage will be noted. The renter is responsible for any new damage found upon return.
rt_late_return_text: Late returns will incur a penalty fee of €50 per hour or part thereof, unless a later return time has been agreed upon in advance.
rt_permitted_uses_text: The caravan is to be used for recreational and holiday purposes only. It must be operated in a safe and responsible manner.
rt_prohibited_activities_text: Prohibited activities include, but are not limited to: smoking inside the caravan, transporting illegal substances, using the caravan for commercial purposes without prior written consent, and exceeding the maximum occupancy.
rt_geo_restrictions_text: The caravan may be used within Estonia, Latvia, and Lithuania. Travel to other countries requires prior written approval and may incur additional insurance costs.
rt_max_occupancy_text: The maximum occupancy of the caravan is 5 persons, as per its design and safety regulations.
rt_cleaning_req_text: The renter is responsible for returning the caravan in a clean and tidy condition, both internally and externally. This includes emptying the toilet cassette and wastewater tank. A cleaning fee of €75 will be charged if the caravan is returned uncleaned.
rt_damage_liability_text: The renter is liable for any damage to the caravan or its contents, or loss of equipment, that occurs during the rental period, up to the amount of the security deposit. For damages exceeding the deposit, the renter is liable for the full cost of repair or replacement, unless covered by insurance and not due to renter negligence.
rt_insurance_coverage_text: The caravan is covered by comprehensive and third-party liability insurance. The renter's liability (excess) in case of an insured event is €500. Details of the insurance coverage will be provided at the time of booking.
rt_req_docs_text: The primary driver must be at least 25 years old and hold a valid B-category driving license for at least 3 years. A copy of the driver's license and ID/passport will be required at pickup.
rt_maintenance_guarantee_text: We ensure the caravan is in a roadworthy and well-maintained condition at the start of the rental period. All equipment will be in working order.
rt_breakdown_assist_text: In the event of a mechanical breakdown, roadside assistance is provided. Contact details and procedures will be supplied at pickup. We are not responsible for accommodation or other costs resulting from a breakdown, unless the breakdown is due to our negligence in maintenance.
rt_insurance_provided_text: We provide standard comprehensive and third-party liability insurance for the caravan. The renter is encouraged to obtain personal travel insurance.
rt_pets_policy_text: Well-behaved pets are allowed by prior agreement only and may incur an additional cleaning fee of €50. The renter is responsible for any damage caused by pets.
rt_smoking_policy_text: Smoking is strictly prohibited inside the caravan. A penalty of €200 will be charged if this rule is violated to cover deep cleaning costs.
rt_additional_fees_text: Additional fees may apply for optional extras (e.g., bedding, outdoor furniture), late return, uncleaned caravan, damage, or traffic violations. A full list of potential fees is available upon request.
pp_intro_text_1: Welcome to Caravan Rentals Tartu (hereinafter referred to as "we", "us", or "our"). We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring that your personal information is handled in a safe and responsible manner. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your information when you visit our website ([Your Website URL Here, if applicable, otherwise remove placeholder]).
pp_intro_text_2: This policy applies to our website and services and explains your rights regarding your personal data under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
pp_info_collected_text_1: We collect minimal information to enhance your experience on our website. The only personal data we actively collect and store is your preferred language setting.
pp_info_collected_text_2: Language Preference: To provide you with a seamless browsing experience in your chosen language, we store your language preference (e.g., English, Estonian, Russian) using localStorage on your device. This is an essential cookie that helps our website remember your choice for future visits.
pp_info_collected_text_3: We do not collect any other personally identifiable information (PII) such as your name, email address, phone number, IP address, or location data through our website's general browsing functionality.
pp_info_collected_text_4: If you contact us directly via email or phone for booking inquiries, we will collect the information you provide (e.g., name, contact details, rental dates) solely for the purpose of processing your request and managing your booking. This information is handled separately from website browsing data and is subject to our booking terms and conditions.
pp_how_info_used_text_1: The information we collect (your language preference) is used solely for the following purpose:
pp_how_info_used_item_1: To Personalize Your Experience: Displaying the website content in your selected language.
pp_how_info_used_text_2: Information provided during booking inquiries is used for communication, processing bookings, and providing rental services.
pp_data_storage_security_text_1: Language Preference: Your language preference is stored locally in your web browser's localStorage. This data is not transmitted to or stored on our servers. It remains on your device until you clear your browser's cache and cookies or specifically delete it.
pp_data_storage_security_text_2: Booking Information: Information provided for bookings is stored securely in our internal systems with appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
pp_data_storage_security_text_3: We are committed to ensuring the security of your information. However, please note that no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your personal information, we cannot guarantee its absolute security.
pp_user_rights_gdpr_text_1: Under the GDPR, you have several rights regarding your personal data. Since we only store language preference locally on your device via the website, these rights primarily apply to data you might provide us directly for bookings:
pp_user_rights_item_1: The right to access: You have the right to request copies of your personal data that we hold.
pp_user_rights_item_2: The right to rectification: You have the right to request that we correct any information you believe is inaccurate or complete information you believe is incomplete.
pp_user_rights_item_3: The right to erasure (right to be forgotten): You have the right to request that we erase your personal data, under certain conditions.
pp_user_rights_item_4: The right to restrict processing: You have the right to request that we restrict the processing of your personal data, under certain conditions.
pp_user_rights_item_5: The right to object to processing: You have the right to object to our processing of your personal data, under certain conditions.
pp_user_rights_item_6: The right to data portability: You have the right to request that we transfer the data that we have collected to another organization, or directly to you, under certain conditions.
pp_user_rights_gdpr_text_2: To exercise any of these rights, please contact us using the contact information provided below.
pp_cookie_policy_link_text: For more detailed information about the cookies we use, specifically the essential cookie for language preference, please see our Cookie Policy.
pp_changes_policy_text: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this page.
pp_contact_info_text_1: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data protection practices, or if you wish to exercise your rights, please contact us:
cp_intro_text_1: This Cookie Policy explains how Caravan Rentals Tartu (hereinafter referred to as "we", "us", or "our") uses cookies on our website ([Your Website URL Here, if applicable, otherwise remove placeholder]). By using our website, you consent to the use of cookies as described in this policy.
cp_intro_text_2: What are cookies? Cookies are small text files that are stored on your computer or mobile device when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work, or work more efficiently, as well as to provide information to the owners of the site.
cp_intro_text_3: Types of cookies we use: We only use essential cookies on our website. These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your language preferences.
cp_essential_cookies_text_1: Below is a list of the essential cookies we use on our website:
cp_cookie_purpose_text: To remember your selected language preference so that you do not have to set it again on subsequent visits. This allows us to display the website content in your chosen language automatically.
cp_cookie_storage_text: localStorage (a type of web storage that allows websites to store data locally within the user's browser).
cp_cookie_duration_text: This data persists in your browser's localStorage until it is manually cleared by you (e.g., by clearing your browser's cache and site data). It does not have an automatic expiration date set by us.
cp_essential_cookies_text_2: We do not use any non-essential cookies, such as those for analytics, advertising, or tracking.
cp_manage_cookies_text_1: Since we only use an essential cookie stored in localStorage for language preference, traditional cookie consent banners are not required. However, you can control and/or delete localStorage data as you wish.
cp_manage_cookies_text_2: Browser Settings: Most web browsers allow some control of most cookies (including localStorage) through the browser settings. You can usually find these settings in the 'options' or 'preferences' menu of your browser. To find out more about cookies, including how to see what cookies have been set and how to manage and delete them, visit www.allaboutcookies.org.
cp_manage_cookies_text_3: Deleting localStorage Data: You can clear data stored by websites in localStorage by clearing your browser's cache, browsing history, or site data. The exact steps may vary depending on your browser:
cp_manage_chrome: Google Chrome: Settings > Privacy and security > Clear browsing data.
cp_manage_firefox: Mozilla Firefox: Options > Privacy & Security > Cookies and Site Data > Clear Data.
cp_manage_edge: Microsoft Edge: Settings > Privacy, search, and services > Clear browsing data.
cp_manage_cookies_text_4: Effects of Disabling/Deleting: If you delete the preferredLanguage data from your localStorage, our website will no longer remember your language preference, and you will need to select your language again on your next visit. It will not affect the core functionality of the website other than the language display.
cp_changes_policy_text: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Cookie Policy on this page. We encourage you to review this Cookie Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Cookie Policy are effective when they are posted on this page.
